confirm.title: Delete Polymorpher
confirm.content: Are you sure you want to delete this polymorpher?

dialogs.nonenodelete: None but not delete the loaded actors

resetsettings.title: Reset Module Settings
resetsettings.content: Are you sure you want to reset all of the module settings to the current system's defaults? THIS CANNOT BE UNDONE!

storeonactor.title: Store Polymorphers on Actor
storeonactor.hint: Store the polymorphers on the actor instead of the token by default.

enableautomations.title: Enable Automations
enableautomations.hint: Enable the polymorpher automation system on spellcast.

autoclose.title: Auto-Close
autoclose.hint: Automatically close the polymorpher window after summoning.

hidebutton.title: Hide Polymorpher Button
hidebutton.hint: Hide the polymorpher button on the character sheet.

restrictOwned.title: Only Owned Actors
restrictOwned.hint: Restrict the polymorpher list to only show owned polymorphers actors.

restrictOnlyGM.title: Only GM can see Polymorpher button
restrictOnlyGM.hint: Restrict the polymorpher list to GMs only

removeLabelSheetHeader.title: Remove label from sheet header button
removeLabelSheetHeader.hint: Remove label from sheet header button useful for small monitor, tablet

hudColumn.title: HUD Column
hudColumn.hint: Which HUD column to place the button in

hudTopBottom.title: HUD Top/Bottom
hudTopBottom.hint: Where to place the button in the column

hudEnable.title: Enable token HUD feature
hudEnable.hint: Avoid the rendering of the polymorpher manager for fast polymorphing when click on the hud button. All the entities with a 'default summon type' setted on the token/actor configuration, will let you avoid the rendering of the polymorpher manager, can be really useful for fast combat, there two options 'random' and 'ordered' you can't enable both. Remember you must own the token for see the HUD button

hudColorButton.title: HUD feature color button
hudColorButton.hint: Choose what color to use for the HUD button

forceUseOfWarpgate.title: Force use of Warpgate
forceUseOfWarpgate.hint: If enabled it will use the warpgate mutate function instead the system default mechanism if present, e.g. DnD5e has is own Polymorpher mechanism

reset.name: Reset settings to default
reset.label: Reset Settings To Default
reset.hint: This will reset all of the settings of back to the active game system's default.

debug.name: Enable debugging
debug.label: Prints debug messages to the console

automated-polymorpher.polymorphKeepClass: Keep proficiency bonus (leaves class items in sheet)
automated-polymorpher.polymorphKeepMental: Keep mental ability scores (Int, Wis, Cha)
automated-polymorpher.polymorphKeepPhysical: Keep physical ability scores (Str, Dex, Con)
automated-polymorpher.polymorphKeepSelf: Keep self (just changing image and size for emulate spell like Alter Self and Disguise Self)
automated-polymorpher.polymorphKeepAEOnlyOriginNotEquipment: Keep only Active effects which origin is not equipment (override the 'Not Keep Active effects' if checked)
automated-polymorpher.polymorphMergeSaves: Merge saving throw proficiencies (take the highest)
automated-polymorpher.polymorphRevertWarn: You do not have permission to revert this Actor's polymorphed state.
automated-polymorpher.polymorphRevertNoOriginalActorWarn: No original actor is founded with reference '{reference}'
automated-polymorpher.polymorphWarn: You are not allowed to polymorph this actor!
